```{r}

# Import dataset

if (!require(pacman))
  install.packages("pacman")

pacman::p_load(tidymodels,
               tidyverse,
               ranger,
               randomForest,
               glmnet,
               here,
               formattable,
               dlookr,
               yardstick,
               gridExtra)

# Read colony data (dataset is from 2015 - 2021)
colony <- read_csv(here('./data/colony.csv'))
colony |> filter(state %in% "Arizona")
colony |> summary()

# Read stressor data
stressor <- read_csv(here('./data/stressor.csv'))
stressor |> filter(state %in% "Arizona")
stressor |> summary()
```
